details.arabic_diacless: رب لا تذر على الارض من الكٰفرين ديارا‏
details.arabic: رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى الۡاَرۡضِ مِنَ الۡكٰفِرِيۡنَ دَيَّارًا‏
details.transliteration: rabbi latathar AAala al-ardi mina alkafireenadayyara
details.translations: My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
